name: Coins of rage
description:
Coins of rage

You alway take too much money from the citizens, but one day, they decided to fight against you, this day is now, try to get one more coin from them and things will get worse for you.

Instructions

Use the mouse cursor to aim the enemies

Left mouse button: shoot

W and D keys: Move

Space Button: Jump

Credits Developer:

Luiz Gustavo Alves

https://twitter.com/bingustavo
